text: Cry Macho is an American neo-Western drama movie directed and produced by Clint Eastwood. He also stars in the movie. It is based on the 1975 novel of the same name by N. Richard Nash. The movie was produced by Eastwood's Malpaso Productions. It was theatrically released by Warner Bros. Pictures, and digitally on HBO Max, on September 17, 2021. ==References== Category:2021 drama movies Category:2020s Western (genre) movies Category:American drama movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:HBO Max
title: Cry Macho (movie)
